properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO ,USER_ID ,USER_PWD ,USER_NAME ,EMAIL ,PHONE ,ENROLL_DATE ,MODIFY_DATE ,STATUS FROM "USER" WHERE ROLL IN('U','M') ORDER BY ROLL, USER_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM "USER" WHERE USER_ID = ?
INSERT INTO "USER" VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , SYSDATE ,'U' ,'U')
